snippet: Better urban policies can put China on a healthier path, economically and environmentally.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Treasury Sec Henry M Paulson Jr contends revitalizing China's economic model is critical for future prosperity not only in China, but around the world; outlines way in which smarter urban growth policies could help put nation on healthier path, both economically and environmentally.
lead_paragraph: Better urban policies can put China on a healthier path, economically and environmentally.
